Constructor Detail

Server

public Server(int port,
              int numOfPlayers)
Initializes the port number and all place informations. listens for the client connection untill number of clients connected will meet number of players.

Parameters:
port - - port number which we have to listen for client connection.
numOfPlayers - - Number of players connecting to this server.
